title: Ali’s Film Club: Alien and Aliens - with Ian Nathan and Alien Romulus’s Fede Álvarez
content: With xenomorphs back in cinemas, Ali and friend of the show Ian Nathan - who just so happens to have written the book / documentary on the subject, no big deal - sit down to discuss just why we love the original two Alien films so much. Plus, as a bonus, director of Alien Romulus (and fellow die hard Alien fan) Fede Álvarez stops by at the end with his thoughts on what makes the franchise’s facehuggers, flamethrowers and incredibly creepy eggs such an appealing combination.
